name: Baby Land - Monsters Retreat! (Peter Christodoulou)
description:
A quick ScatterJam game made by our group under a given theme "Kids vs Monsters", with additional development since
Use arrow keys to grab power-ups to gain abilities.  Learn to walk, run, jump, and shoot monsters.

Controls (Require power-ups):
Up - Jump
Comma - Run
Period - Shoot
Down - Crawl

Credits:
Marc Moellinger - Character Art
Sean Murphy - Environmental Art
Peter Christodoulou - Unity
